thread.title: Green Day Continues to Protest Against Trump With Their Video For "Troubled Times"
thread.title_full: Green Day Continues to Protest Against Trump With Their Video For "Troubled Times"

author: Maggie Pehanick
title: Green Day Continues to Protest Against Trump With Their Video For "Troubled Times"
text:
Green Day's "Troubled Times" Music Video Green Day Continues to Protest Against Trump With Their Video For "Troubled Times" January 17, 2017 by Maggie Pehanick 117 Shares 
Months after their controversial anti-Donald Trump performance at the American Music Awards , Green Day has released a video for "Troubled Times." While it's billed as a lyric video, it packs as much punch as a full-fledged music video, tackling issues like racism and women's rights by flashing protest signs and pictures from throughout history, asking "What did we learn?" The track is off their Revolution Radio album, and we'll have to stay tuned to see if we get a video starring the actual group.
